column4: im on Lucid can someone help me with my firefox 3.6.8 it keeps hanging and crashing....I always have to kill the pid
run it using: firefox -safe-mode     and see if it still crashes, if not, then one of your add ons or plugins is doing it
private or safe mode? in private mode plugins work, in safe mode, they won't
don't use older versions, they are vulnerable, try google chrome
